SageTVPlugin.Name: External Apps
SageTVPlugin.Description: Provides a button on the Video Options menu that can be used to run any external application, using the current video filename (among other things) as an argument.
SageTVPlugin.Author: JREkiwi
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Move To GitHub 4.0.5.2 Fix Java Dependency
4.0.5.1 Change download to HTTPS
4.0.5 Fix for extraneous path being displayed in Video Folder view when in Separate Folder Style
4.0.4 Add workaround for changes in TMT5 handling of BDMV paths. The workaround can be enabled on a per application basis.
4.0.3 V7 Port of External Apps import
